name: The Dog Named Dot
description:
This is a project I made for Global game jam 2021. I have done it solo!

The Dog Named Dot is a short adventure and walking simulation game based on my own personal story. Players control Dot the Dalmatian as we follow her journey of learning, growing, and loving the humans around her. The Dog Named Dot is played from a third-person perspective. Follow Dot the Dalmatian to her journey of love and loss and what remains after.

You can use PS4 controller to play as well (but it is still require mouse to navigate the UI)

Asset List and Credits
